attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: After I got this app my phone literally glitched so much!! Definitely not worth it 😔

attributes.title: terrible orange man terrible app
attributes.review: i hate this app. it took around 24 hours to download and it was so annoying. i expected something helpful but all i got were very explicit photos of donald trump. ( nude photos) not worth it. very very very inappropriate. i want to rip my eyes out😡 im very angry and disgusted. please for the love of god, get rid of this app. im very embarrassed to say hes our president. 🤢disgosting. 0 STARS.

attributes.title: AWFUL APP
attributes.review: Made my phone crash multiple times!!!! Do not download!!!!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it killed my dog.

attributes.title: Ewwww!! A Cheeto! 🤢🤮
attributes.review: Ok as soon as I opened the app it took all my information. I got a bunch of spam calls from random numbers. Also, it was extremely glitchy AND it has some viruses. After I sorted that out I was checking the app features and I saw a Cheeto? It honestly looked like a Cheeto but I think it was a nude picture of the president. HOW DISGUSTING!!! My LITTLE sister saw it and we had to take her to the hospital. The doctors said that the picture was too disgusting for her so they had to take her eyes out. Now she can’t see anything and she has no eyes. When we got hope we also notice some rats and raccoons eating my cat while chanting “TRUMP 2020” over and over. I do NOT recommend this app at ALL! 🤬😡
Sir, I am so disgusted and unsettled by the background of this app and omg🤢 just thinking about it makes me wanna vomit 🤮

attributes.title: This app is CURSED 😡😔✨
attributes.review: Once I downloaded this app, HORRIBLE things started happening. For example, just one minute after I downloaded the app, my fish drowned in the 4 ft tank I JUST bought him. Then, right AFTER that I had to fold the dishes but it turns out, the dishes folded themselves! please do not get this app it will haunt you for the rest of your LIFE.

attributes.title: Could be better
attributes.review: Definitely a horrible app to use. No matter which way u spin it I just can never stop seeing pictures of a nasty old wrinkled up orange!!! And on top of that he looks like a räpïśt and child predator.
